post.text: "Today, I'm asking for your vote. Tomorrow, let's make history together." â€”Hillary hillaryclinton.com/locate

comment.author: Rikka
comment.text: I wish you the best of luck ! You have my vote. Please make sure you uphold your promises. Our women and children and country need you. There are 4 schools on lockdown now. I know you can't be superwoman and fix everything. I will be voting first thing tomorrow.

replies.author: Rikka
replies.text: Ann Hartvigsen Thank you. As a mother of a teenage daughter I am disappointed and disgusted with trump. All he does is degrade women , make fun of people with disabilities. All he does is parade around with his family and never interact with the crowds. I just hope everyone makes the right choice.

replies.author: Miranda
replies.text: For her to do that we have to vote blue down the ballot. We can't leave a republican Congress..

replies.author: Brayden
replies.text: LOL her promises to Wall Street and all the middle eastern countries that own her? Ya I'm sure she'll uphold her promises to them. The American people...not a chance

replies.author: Donavin
replies.text: I GOT 99 PROBLEMS & A WITCH AIN'T 1 #SatanicHillary #SpiritCooking
